import Axios from "axios"; import { PayPalButton } from 'react-paypal-button-v2'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { detailsOrder, payOrder } from '../actions/orderActions'; import LoadingBox from '../components/LoadingBox'; import MessageBox from '../components/MessageBox'; import { ORDER_PAY_RESET } from "../constants/orderContants"; import axios from "axios"; export default function OrderScreen(props) { const orderId = props.match.params.id; const [order, setOrder] = useState(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(async () => { await axios.get(`http://localhost:2000/order/${orderId}`).then((res) => { setOrder(res.data); }) }, []) return (

{orderId}
